descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Mars Invasion: Red Dawn (VR Shooter)
**Action, Adrenaline, and Premium VR Quality.**

Step into the boots of Ripper, Mars’ last defender, in this fast-paced, demanding sci-fi VR shooter. Hold back the relentless swarms of alien spiders across compact arenas, expertly designed for constant motion and total adrenaline.

⚔️ **CORE GAMEPLAY** ⚔️
Dynamic Arsenal: Master combat with the lightsaber, laser pistol, proximity bombs, machine gun and  heavy weapons. Every combination changes your strategy, forcing you to read the battlefield every single second.

[media]

**A complete experience**, with guaranteed hours of gameplay and constant updates ensuring maximum value and replayability.

**Total VR Comfort: Extreme optimization prevents motion sickness, allowing for maximum immersion and a completely comfortable experience.**

Are you ready for the invasion?

[media]

**10 Expertly Crafted Scenarios: Fight aboard the invaded "Light of Orion" ship, the unforgiving Martian arrival, the mining colony, and extreme environments like the Sandstorm and the Martian Dark Night.**

[media]

**The night fills with shadows and endless swarms of spiders… but your laser rifle pierces the darkness and your machine gun roars with fury. There is no escape for them: you destroy them mercilessly, dominating the battlefield.**

[media]

**The sandstorm ravages the horizon, but in your hands shine two Thunderstrakers—weapons so powerful they tear through the tempest and mercilessly obliterate the spiders.**
